abstract: Stocks rise slightly, despite tepid energy shares and retailers reports.
lead_paragraph: Indexes were mainly unchanged as an early rally in crude oil prices evaporated.
snippet: Indexes were mainly unchanged as an early rally in crude oil prices evaporated....

headline.main: Wall St. Is Weighed Down by Energy Stocks and Retailers
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Gains, Despite Lackluster Energy Shares and Retailers
